title: End-to-End Payroll Processing
short: Monthly & annual payroll processing for organisations, tax calculations and payslip generation.
details: Complete payroll cycle: attendance handling, salary calculation, TDS, reimbursements, adjustments and payroll reconciliation. Works across multiple states with multi-company support.

title: Statutory Compliance & Filings
short: PF, ESIC, Bonus, Gratuity, LWF filings and statutory record maintenance.
details: Registration, periodic returns, audits, and coordination with EPFO/ESIC/NPS portals. Ensure 100% compliance and audit-ready documentation.

title: Payroll Automation & Reporting
short: Automation of repetitive payroll tasks using Excel VBA & Power Automate, plus dashboards.
details: Build macros, automated flows, and reporting templates to reduce manual work and errors. Deliver Excel dashboards and scheduled reports.

title: Vendor & Statutory Audits
short: Prepare for and assist with vendor audits, statutory audits and labour inspections.
details: Support during audits, prepare documents, reconcile findings and implement corrective actions to remain compliant with CLRA, Maternity Act and Shop & Establishment rules.

title: Employee Benefits & Gratuity
short: Manage employee benefits: food coupons, gratuity, leave encashment and vendor coordination.
details: Design and administer benefit programs, vendor handling for food coupons, claim processing, and gratuity administration.

title: Portal Expertise (EPFO, NPS, Ascent)
short: Hands-on experience with EPFO, ESIC, NPS CRA and Ascent payroll portal operations.
details: Portal-based registrations, eKYC, contribution reconciliation and troubleshooting for portal-based filings.
